__TOC__

LOUD is a customized Ubuntu distribution that is used by the Lane Department of Computer Science and Electrical Engineering at West Virginia University. The goal of the LOUD Platform Project is to make LOUD more accessible to students such that it can be installed in a virtual machine and used without disturbing the host operating system. <<BR>>
